channel.title: CVE Feed for matthiask -- html-sanitizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for matthiask -- html-sanitizer

item.title: CVE-2024-34078|2024-08-26T18:03:11.753Z -- matthiask -- html-sanitizer
item.description: html-sanitizer is an allowlist-based HTML cleaner. If using `keep_typographic_whitespace=False` (which is the default), the sanitizer normalizes unicode to the NFKC form at the end. Some unicode characters normalize to chevrons; this allows specially crafted HTML to escape sanitization. The problem has been fixed in 2.4.2.
